subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joe Girardi, who was fired by the Marlins six weeks ago because of strained relationships with team executives, was selected as N.L. Manager of the Year. Detroit manager Jim Leyland won the A.L. award.
snippet: Joe Girardi, who was fired by the Marlins six weeks ago because of strained relationships with team executives, was selected as N.L. Manager of the Year. Detroit manager Jim Leyland won the A.L. award.
